joinUs.successMsg:
Thank you for requesting an invitation to the GlobeOne
community. We will get back to you soon.
joinUs.errorMsg:
We're sorry, we were not able to process
your request. Please try again later.
joinUs.duplicateMsg:
The email address has already been used,
do you want us to resend the Join Us email?

contactUs.successMsg:
Thank you for contacting us.
We will get back to you soon.
contactUs.errorMsg:
We're sorry, we were not able to process
your request. Please try again later.
